name: 陳凱瀛
objective: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)乃是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將介紹自動化及製造現場資料收集方式與架構，也將介紹基本資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後將重點放在商業智慧議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體。
schedule:
Week 1-2:Introduction to Computer Integrated Manufacturing System
Week 3-4:Introduction to Automated Manufacturing Systems and FMS
Week 5:Barcode and RFID 
Week 6-7:Manufacturing Execution System (MES)
Week 8: Midterm Exam and Project
Week 9-10:IDEF0 and Petri Net
Week 11:Case Study (Machining Plant, IC Fab, IC Packaging Plant…)
Week 12-13:Database Concepts
Week 14-15:Data Warehouse
Week 16-17: Business Intelligence
Week 18: Final Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
平常成績 10%  
期中考（或期刊論文報告） 15%  
期末考（或期刊論文報告）15% 
期中資料收集資訊系統開發30% 
期末商業智慧系統實作專題30%
materials:
1. N. Viswanadham and Y. Narahari, “Performance Modeling of Automated Manufacturing Systems, Prentice Hall, 1992.
2. J. Kletti, ”Manufacturing Execution System-MES”, Springer, 2007.
3. Claus Heinrich, “RFID and Beyond”, Wiley Publishing, Inc., 2005.
4.王立志，”系統化運籌與供應鏈管理”，滄海書局，民國八十八年。
5.Paper articles.
